name: Runolor
description:
This game was made for MiniJam 62 using the theme "Colors". One limitation of the jam was that we could only make 2 frames animation.

This is an infinite-runner game in which you place colors in the platforms.

The green color makes you jump and the blue color makes you go down.

"1" to select the green color.

"2" to select the blue color.

Music credits: 

Patrikus Droilius (YT Channel),

Doomblade_4

Scan Visors (YT Channel).
